name: Cool Coolers by Fit & Fresh 4 Pack XL Slim Ice Packs, Quick Freeze Space Saving Reusable Ice Packs for Lunch Boxes or Coolers, Multi
short_description: EXTRA LARGE, SLIM & POWERFUL: Taking "extra chill" to the next level! Measuring at 5” x 2.5” x 7”, these XL ice packs are slim enough to fit in a fully packed bag, yet powerful enough to stay cold for hours. Long-lasting, reusable, and durable. Food and drinks stay fresh on the hottest day of the year!

DURABLE FOR ANY OUTDOOR ADVENTURE: Avoid a leaky cooler backpack or camping tote! Reusable, long-lasting and durable, food/drinks stay clean and dry on any outdoor trek. Make them a necessary part of your beach or camping accessories -- guaranteed you won't be able to hit the road without 'em! To maximize cooling power, freeze each ice pack overnight before next day use.

ENDLESSLY VERSATILE: Packing a lunch for work or school? No sweat! Pack one (or more!) in your insulated lunch bag, lunch box, baby bag, or picnic tote to keep items extra cold -- and colorful. Unlike regular ice that inevitably melts over time, these slim freezer packs were designed to keep your salads crisp and sodas cold without the mess of regular ice. For best results, stack multiple ice packs at the top and sides of your insulated bag!

SAFE AND NON-TOXIC: Built with BPA-free plastic and leakproof protection, the compact Cool Coolers reusable slim ice packs have a durable design that is break-resistant to withstand the toughest tumbles. They're non-toxic and safe to pack with unpackaged food! Easy to clean: simply rinse off and pat dry.

COOL COOLERS BY FIT + FRESH: Redefining the meaning of "cool", the Cool Coolers brand is the most trusted reusable ice brand for its groundbreaking line of dynamic ice packs! Available in multiple sizes, colors, materials, and shapes, Cool Coolers is undoubtedly the best of the best for your insulated bags!
Packaging may vary
product_description: Heading back to work or just need to get out of the house? These Fit & Fresh Cool Coolers XL Ice Packs are larger, thicker and longer lasting. Each ice pack measures 7"" x 4.75"" x 0.50"" making them the perfect solution to keeping food and drinks cold for work, beach days, picnics, and more! For greater cooling power, use several packs together, especially on extra hot days – But make sure to always have one in your freeze.Included in this set are 4 reusable blue ice packs that are non-toxic and BPA-Free Plastic. The versatile shape also allows you to pack ice on the bottom and sides of your lunch bag/cooler without taking up lots of space. Plus, you can prevent germs from the cafeteria, shared office refrigerator, or takeout containers by packing a lunch using these long-lasting ice packs. Hand wash only, do not microwave. Proudly designed in the USA by women, for women, Fit & Fresh is dedicated to supporting your active and healthy lifestyle. We get it. Some days you eat leafy greens and rock it at the gym. Other days you can’t resist a decadent donut and live in yoga pants. We know firsthand that the key to living your best life is creating a colorful balance and we’re here with a line of accessories to help you do just that.

short_description: 3 LAYER CONSTRUCTION - Each reusable ice bag is made with 3 layers, including an outer soft covering, that is soothing to injured tissue and prevents over colling. An absorbent middle layer, to wick away moisture from your skin, clothing and surroundings. A leak-resistant inner layer, to make sure the traumatized area stays dry from the leaking melted ice.

EASY FILL OPENING – These cool therapy bags feature a wide neck opening that allows the ice bags to easily be filled with ice cubes or crushed ice from your own freezer, leaving less of a mess when filling. When the ice bag warms up and melts, simply empty and refill, as often as needed.

EASY CLAMP CLOSURE - Refillable cold therapy first aid bags feature a hook and pin hinge, designed to snap back together securely shutting the cold pack tightly, preventing any leakage and spills. Being refillable, these cool packs are conveniently always ready to use.

COOLING PAIN RELIEF - Cooling ice bags are meant to be placed on any area of your body after an injury to reduce swelling, bruising, muscle soreness and aches. Ice therapy is also used to relieve discomfort from toothaches, headaches, and migraines. Ideal for first aid, acute chronic pain, arthritis, sports injuries and more.

4 SECURING TIE STRAPS - Each bag has four conveniently located straps, 2 on the top and 2 on the bottom of the bag, to tie and secure the ice bag around arms, legs, elbows and knees. Straps help keep the ice pack in place, reducing slipping and sliding, allowing for an easier recovery.
